verses.t: I love{H157} Lordthe {H3068}, because he hath heard{H8085} my voice{H6963} and my supplications{H8469}.
Because he hath inclined{H5186} his ear{H241} unto me, therefore will I call{H7121} upon him as long as I live{H3117}.as long…: Heb. in my days
The sorrows{H2256} of death{H4194} compassed{H661} me, and the pains{H4712} of hell{H7585} gat hold{H4672} upon me: I found{H4672} trouble{H6869} and sorrow{H3015}.gat…: Heb. found me
Then called{H7121} I upon the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068}; LordO {H3068}, I beseech{H577} thee, deliver{H4422} my soul{H5315}.
Gracious{H2587} is Lordthe {H3068}, and righteous{H6662}; yea, our God{H430} is merciful{H7355}.
LordThe {H3068} preserveth{H8104} the simple{H6612}: I was brought low{H1809}, and he helped{H3467} me.
Return{H7725} unto thy rest{H4494}, O my soul{H5315}; Lordfor the {H3068} hath dealt bountifully{H1580} with thee.
For thou hast delivered{H2502} my soul{H5315} from death{H4194}, mine eyes{H5869} from tears{H1832}, and my feet{H7272} from falling{H1762}.
I will walk{H1980} before{H6440} Lordthe {H3068} in the land{H776} of the living{H2416}.
I believed{H539}, therefore have I spoken{H1696}: I was greatly{H3966} afflicted{H6031}:
I said{H559} in my haste{H2648}, All men{H120} are liars{H3576}.
What shall I render{H7725} Lordunto the {H3068} for all his benefits{H8408} toward me?
I will take{H5375} the cup{H3563} of salvation{H3444}, and call{H7121} upon the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068}.
I will pay{H7999} my vows{H5088} Lordunto the {H3068} now in the presence of all his people{H5971}.
Precious{H3368} in the sight{H5869} Lordof the {H3068} is the death{H4194} of his saints{H2623}.
LordO {H3068}, truly{H577} I am thy servant{H5650}; I am thy servant{H5650}, and the son{H1121} of thine handmaid{H519}: thou hast loosed{H6605} my bonds{H4147}.
I will offer{H2076} to thee the sacrifice{H2077} of thanksgiving{H8426}, and will call{H7121} upon the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068}.
I will pay{H7999} my vows{H5088} Lordunto the {H3068} now in the presence of all his people{H5971},
In the courts{H2691} Lord'sof the {H3068} house{H1004}, in the midst{H8432} of thee, O Jerusalem{H3389}. Praise{H1984} Lordye the {H3050}.
